intro: Capsella thomsonii, commonly known as Thomson's morning glory, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. Its leaves are heart-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its stems are slender and twining. Capsella thomsonii is often found in disturbed soils and thrives in sunny, open habitats.
